review:
We were searching for a pediatrician in the town and based on few reviews in practo we finally landed up to in 24 May 2016
The very first interaction we found she is very caring  helpful and friendly and caring. She carries a personality that gives you are in a right place. She started treating with minimal medications as she does not believe in correcting every thing with medications, She will suggest you some some home remedies as well. She will suggest you in what's app as well. I will recommend to family and friends

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would strongly recommend Dr Sravanthi. She heard our problem very patiently for our new born child and explain each and everything related to newly born child's health and advise do's and don't for the baby. Thank you so much Dr Sravanthi for your time. We will definitely visit again if required.

The clinic was in a good location and we are happy with the consultation as the doctor took time in over all assessing our child especially her development and diet which were our main concerns. Received an instant mail of the bill and information regarding baby care . Over all worth the effort and cost. Be prepared  for parking issue as it's a busy area.
Madam is so patience and has a good explanation of health issues and strongly recommended Kindly  helpful for good recovery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She was rude n didn't answer any questions ****** ********* ****** ******* It was not a good use of time..She had no empathy or care
Very nice n patient she answered all my queries very patiently n nice receiving ..  i strongly recommend her

Great doctor. Spend a lot of time with you to understand the problem. Went for our kids perennial cold and cough. Gave him the ***** medication and some tips to avoid future issues. Seeing her regularly to eradicate the issue completely or avoid
She is too good, she listens you with patience. I have never seen such a humble doctor.She prefers to give less medicine too.Stress more to increase immunity
I would like to appreciate doctor she explained very well about each and every doubt.I recommend to consult the doctor for children health care.

the services are good and the doctors advice are good but i feel the fees are bit exorbitant rs 400 for consulting is too on the higher side considering other doctors other wise its a very good expericence
